string-array.name: prefSummaries_autoAdvance
string-array.item: Bonisa izingxoxo ezintsha ngemva kokususa, ingobo yomlando, njalo njalo.
Bonisa izingxoxo ezindala ngemva kokususa, ingobo yomlando, njalo njalo
Bonisa uhlu lwengxoxo ngemva kokusula, ingobo yomlando, njalo njalo

string-array.name: prefEntries_messageTextSizeSummary
string-array.item: Bonisa okuqukethwe kwemilayezo kumbhalo wosayizi omncane kakhulu
Bonisa okuqukethwe kwemiyalezo ngombhalo wosayizi omncane
Bonisa okuqukethwe kwemiyalezo kumbhalo wosayizi ovamile
Bonisa okuqukethwe kwemilayezo kumbhalo wosayizi omkhulu
Bonisa okuqukethwe kwemilayezo ngombhalo wosayizi omkhulu kakhulu

string-array.name: prefSummaries_snapHeader
string-array.item: Bonisa njalo izenzo zemlayezo phezu kwesikrini
Bonisa kuphela izenzo zemlayezo phezu kwesikrini uma ijikelezwe ku-potrait
Ungakhombisi le myalezo ngaphandle kwesihloko somyalezo
